articles.description: Latest football news: Reaction to Dortmund beating PSG 1-0 in Champions League semi-final first leg, plus build-up to Thursday's European & Premier League action.
articles.title: Football latest: Champions League reaction & Premier League news

articles.description: Man Utd loanee Jadon Sancho was described as "rejuvenated" as Borussia Dortmund beat PSG in Champions League semi-final first leg.
articles.title: Jadon Sancho: Borussia Dortmund winger shines against PSG in Champions League

articles.description: Caleb Williams is carrying the hopes of the Chicago Bears on his shoulders, but why are fans so excited? Meet the NFL's next big star.
articles.title: Caleb Williams profile: Who is Chicago Bears' new quarterback?

articles.description: Ryan Garcia denies steroid use after a letter revealing a positive test was leaked to ESPN.
articles.title: Ryan Garcia denies steroid use before Devin Haney fight after positive test report leaked

articles.description: Chelsea manager Emma Hayes believes the race for the Women's Super League title is "done" after her side were beaten 4-3 at Liverpool on Wednesday.
articles.title: Liverpool 4-3 Chelsea: Emma Hayes says WSL 'title race done' after Blues loss

articles.description: American Brittney Griner says she felt "less than human" during her time in a Russian prison for possessing cannabis oil.
articles.title: Brittney Griner felt 'less than human' during Russia imprisonment

articles.description: The Boston Celtics maintain their good form to cruise past the Miami Heat into the Eastern Conference play-off semi-finals.
articles.title: NBA play-offs: Boston Celtics beat Miami Heat to reach Eastern Conference semi-final

articles.description: England will host world champions New Zealand at Twickenham Stadium in September in preparation for October's WXV 1 tournament.
articles.title: Red Roses: England women to face New Zealand at Twickenham

articles.description: Amid Manchester United's squad being put up for sale, BBC Sport have worked with CIES Football Observatory to calculate the approximate market value of each player.
articles.title: Manchester United players for sale: How much is the squad worth?

articles.description: Ralf Rangnick says he is committed to leading Austria at Euro 2024 after holding talks with Bayern Munich.
articles.title: Ralf Rangnick to remain Austria boss after Bayern Munich talks
